Welcome:
Welcome to "Doors and levels game beta" 
 You can go to a next level by choosing and entering one of the given numbers.
SelectAndEnterNumber: Select and enter one of the given numbers:
ThankYouForPlaying:
Thank you for playing!
Press any button to quit
YouHaveEnteredWrongValue: You have entered a wrong value. Please enter a number
YouHaveEnteredWrongValuePleaseEnterNumbe: You have entered a wrong number. Please enter one of the numbers listed
DoorsAmount: Please, enter amount of numbers (5 is default)
PreviousLevelNumber: Please enter a number for going to previous level (0 is default)
ExitCommand: Please enter the exit command (x is default)
